name: Crazy Ball Down
description:
Free skill game, trace brick walls and drive the crazy ball to the basket located at the bottom.
Simple operation: simply trace lines with your finger on the screen. The lines become brick platforms and the ball can move over them.
Avoid the crazy ball falling to the bottom and take it to the basket.
Dodge the obstacles that will kill your ball and go down!
Realistic physics game, to think, be quick and speed up the mind.
